pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parallel Implementation of 'ETERNA 3.40' for Prediction and Analysis of Earth Tides // This is a port of 'Fortran ETERNA 3.4' http://igets.u-strasbg.fr/soft_and_tool.php by H.G. Wenzel for calculating synthetic Earth tides using the Hartmann and Wenzel (1994) doi:10.1029/95GL03324 or Kudryavtsev (2004) doi:10.1007/s00190-003-0361-2 tidal catalogs.
